title: Thizz, A Love Story
description: Dani is in love, that much she knows. Now if she could just figure out who or what she loves. Is it the blue pill that masks her depression and helps her float through the last few months of high school? Is it Nick, the boy that won her heart and keeps her from feeling completely alone in the world? Or is it Matt, the blue eyed boy that makes her feel alive and keeps her veins filled with drugs?When the horrors of her past resurface Dani is forced out of the euphoric world sheâ€™s created to face a deadly reality. Unsure who to trust, Dani turns to the one thing she knows will never let her down. Thizz.
author: Nicole Loufas
